document.description: every time i go in this store my order is wrong either i dont get my biscuits my drink is wrong it is ... guess you didn't!Most of you who come into the fast food restaurant ...

Dunkin Donuts
Posted: 2012-05-20 by Juliamay
Mean cashier Complaint Rating: Well this morning I came n wanted to buy 2 little donuts, n the cashier told me, u can't buy two little donuts n the manager came n said there is no key in the register, that was a lie, there is a key to ring a customers like that, why put little ones if u cannot sale individual, u can't... McDonalds
Posted: 2012-05-18 by aliciafisk
customer service Complaint Rating: I went to my local mcdonalds drive thu on the 14th of may 2012 I had my two young children with me Iwas due to start work in approx 1hr so I chose the drivethru for convenience, i ordered myself and my children some food i proceded to the payment booth i handed a young man my credit card then... Burger King
Posted: 2012-05-18 by Debbie7
COLD temp in BK Complaint Rating: I live in Illinois and the weather has just turned nice and warm--again. Today we had a nice warm day, 81*F. When my friend and I stopped at the BK in Ottawa, IL, for lunch it was freezing inside. I know that not everyone gets cold like I do but even my friend was complaining about the cold... Subway Cocoa Beach&Subway Cape Canaveral
Posted: 2012-05-17 by PissedOff3
Dirty, Rude and Insulting Complaint Rating: I went to cocoa beach subway (it is a subway/dairy queen) near state road 520 in Cocoa Beach on north Atlantic avenue. When I walked in my opinion it needed to be cleaner (in my opinion it was a roach motel). I grudgingly ordered a sandwich and had special conditions that they would not adhere... McDonalds
Posted: 2012-05-16 by Gefolde
McDonalds employees pulls prank on single mom Complaint Rating: Tonight, after a 13 hour day at work, I stopped by this McDonalds to bring my kids home dinner. I ordered 4 hamburgers and a mcflurry. When my kids opened their hamburgers, there was a single slice of tomato and a pickle. No hamburger, no condiments, nothing but a single slice of tomato and... It has always been my favorite and no other fast food version can touch it. So I was shocked and saddened to receive what Burger King is now calling their mushroom and swiss…2 regular size...
